text:
there is a typo in mod_cgi.c that manifests itself in the error log as a 
nuisance, it is: "script not found or unable to stat", which of course needs to 
be start, not stat.
creator: zach@gourou.tk
nd@perlig.de
text:
Nope, that is correct. "stat" comes from stat(2) system call.

Thanks for your care anyway and thanks for using Apache!
